authors: Chevron Allen (Cirnoble) based on work by Uriah Brown (PanoramicPanda), David Lee (camperdave), and Corin Stratton (cwstra)
instructions:
A simplified adaptation of the Pokemon Tabletop United v1 sheet. This sheet is backwards compatible with the original sheet, it's reccommended that you make a backup of your game before applying this sheet to an existing game.

    This sheet includes:
    Damage Calculation Macro
    Injury Automation
    Stat Automation
    Global Bonuses
    Quick Notes section
    Shortcuts for Known moves
    Updated Roll Page (now called the Actions Page)
    Notes Page
    
    
    ! Important !
    This sheet does not support automization for specific edges/features/abilities.
